item.description:
Brattle Theatre

http://www.brattlefil...

Repertory Series!
American Dreamer: A Tribute to Dennis Hopper
Restored 35mm Print!
Night Tide
7:30 PM
Double Feature w/TRACKS


Combine Splash, The Odyssey, and Cat People and you've got NIGHT TIDE. One of Dennis Hopper's first starring roles finds him enamored with a raven-haired beauty who plays a mermaid in the local carnival. Strange things start happening and Hopper's character (Johnny) begins to suspect that his girlfriend may be slightly more than she seems. Campy, but also strangely sexy with moments of great depth and, bizarrely, literary merit, NIGHT TIDE is one to be watched again and again.

http://www.brattlefil...

Following dessert at Finale!

if you want to skip the movie, join us at Finale at 9pm!

Maia 781-718-6203
